answers.answer: curious, what is it? what type of symtoms? decribe it for us.

Hi, one has to look for the cause of neuralgia. Please describe your symptoms in detail, also how old are you and do you have diabetes? Neuralgia can be effectively treated with medications but cure is not possible.Drugs like gabapentin, amitryptline etc are quite efficacious. For more information visit http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Neuralgia

question: I was told I had Neuralgia in the upper part of my back. I doctor I seen said there was no cure. Its seems to me like it has spread down my back. They told my is due to shingles but I never had shingles. can you help me I have been living with this pain for 4 years know. My skin is nob in my back and when it flames up it really hurts.Thank you
title: is there a cure
